attributes.action: Make bullying in schools punishable by Law
attributes.additional_details: We would like to campaign to make bullying in Schools a punishable offence by Law.  To ensure the victim, receives protection and support, and that Schools that take no action, or do not implement the zero tolerance policy, also face charges of bullying, and failure to act.  Please sign this petition to bring this to the attention of the Government.   NO MORE BULLYING.  Let's take action NOW.
attributes.background: Further to the show, This Morning on 23rd February 2016, hi-lighting, yet again, the Extent of bullying in Schools.  Showing the affect this has on the victim's lives.  The fact some young people feel the only way out, is to take there own life.  Is getting out of control.  Action needs taking now.
